name: globally
content:
globally adverb
(ACROSS THE WORLD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 across the whole world: The company has to be able to compete globally. Globally, rates of asthma have been rising for years.
More examplesFewer examplesShe thinks globally and acts locally.He was respected globally and was an eminent historian.In 1918, the Spanish flu infected one in five people globally.
